title: Boris Johnson urges Donald Trump to scrap whisky tariffs
text:
Boris Johnson has personally lobbied Donald Trump to scrap tariffs on single malt whisky that threaten thousands of Scottish jobs after facing demands to intervene.

The Prime Minister used a phone call to the US President on Wednesday evening to express his "disappointment" at the decision to impose tariffs on a series of UK exports next week, including Scotch.

An official Downing Street readout of their conversation noted that the move would harm a "number of industries including Scotch Whisky".

It said Mr Johnson "pressed the President not to impose the tariffs". His intervention came as sources said Jackson Carlaw, the interim Scottish Tory leader, is expected to meet Boris Johnson at Downing...
description: Boris Johnson has personally lobbied Donald Trump to scrap tariffs on single malt whisky that threaten thousands of Scottish jobs after facing demands to intervene.
